item.title: [DISTRELEC-3129] B2C - incl. Shippig cost
item.description: On Productdetail page, when logged in as B2C customer: It says inkl. MwSt & Versandkosten! But Versandkosten(shipping cost) is not included in the product price. "und Versandkosten" has to be removed from the sentence or it has to say "inkl. MwSt. & exkl. Versandkosten".
item.summary: B2C - incl. Shippig cost

comments.comment: Screenshots attached.
On B2C the sentence should say: "inkl. MwSt. ohne Versandkosten"
fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3126] OCI customers data migration
item.description:
Some of the OCI configuration has not been migrated:
For example: Leadtime, Unit, or classification.
item.summary: OCI customers data migration

comments.comment:
Hi,

according to the original ticket ( https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-1818 ), we take only OCI fields within names starting with " INDIV_OCI_SPECIAL_FIELDS". However, the fields in this ticket has the names " INDIV_OCI_ITEM_UNIT " and " INDIV_OCI_ITEM_LEADTIME ".

Please add the following fields.

<input type="hidden" name="NEW_ITEM-UNIT[1]" value="TEST1">
<input type="hidden" name="NEW_ITEM-LEADTIME[1]" value="TEST2">
<input type="hidden" name="NEW_ITEM-VENDOR[1]" value="TEST3">
<input type="hidden" name="NEW_ITEM-MATGROUP[1]" value="27061804">
Fixed & tested. Ready to test on the prod env.

- Missing image below "vorteile" is due to password protection of shop which gmail cannot pass.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-3124] order confirmation - variable in mail
item.summary: order confirmation - variable in mail

comments.comment:
Tested it, the behavior is as follows:

- if you create a new user and DON'T fill in Hausnummer nor Postfach, it works fine, address displays correctly.
- If you then add a Hausnummer OR a Postfach, the address displays as shown above:
-- empty line below company name
-- email address shows placeholder
- If you remove Hausnummer and Postfach afterwards, the display of the address in the email REMAINS scrambled

Note:
The address in the PDF follows this pattern. If the address is displayed wrong in the email, it does so as well in the PDF, see attached file

Analyzed further:
- after the billing address is changed in ANY WAY, the name, first name and email address are not part of the address anymore that is attached to an order.

Daniela Truttmann (or her group, depending on how it is set up?) needs to be able to sync new media from staged to live.

See screenshot for the needed permission. Permission to sync full catalog not necessary if those tho permissions are distinct.
item.summary: Permissions: Please add permission to sync catalogue for Daniela Truttmann (or her group)

Hello Raphael,

I have added the rights on the cron job as discussed today and the users are now able to synchronized the complete catalog but not a defined media.
How should I do this?
Done with adding the rights for SynchronizeCatalogVersionWizard object on the distDefaultGroup.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2424] Self-Signed SSL certificates
item.description:
Compass Penetration Test Reference
5.3.2 #1,2 / Page 30
Threat: Medium

Self-signed certificates are in use: 46.140.151.113:443, 46.140.151.112:443

Threat: Users cannot check whether the web server is who he claims to be. Usually, the certificate warning shown to a user is not understood and people get used to ignoring security-relevant dialogs.

Remediation: Ensure that the productive application has real SSL certificates installed that are signed by well-known certificate authorities (CA). Make sure to create a certificate signing request using a strong hashing algorithm such as SHA-1 (not MD5).

SSL Self-Signed Certificate

Finding and Impact: The SSL certificate chain for this service ends in an unrecognized self-signed certificate. The X.509 certificate chain for this service is not signed by a recognized certificate authority. If the remote host is a public host in production, this nullifies the use of SSL as anyone could establish a man-in-the-middle attack against the remote host. Note that this plugin does not check for certificate chains that end in a certificate that is not self-signed, but is signed by an unrecognized certificate authority.

Comment/Solution: Purchase or generate a proper certificate for this service.

SSL Certificate Cannot be Trusted

Finding and Impact: The server's X.509 certificate does not have a signature from a known public certificate authority. This situation can occur in three different ways, each of which results in a break in the chain below which certificates cannot be trusted. First, the top of the certificate chain sent by the server might not be descended from a known public certificate authority. This can occur either when the top of the chain is an unrecognized, self-signed certificate, or when intermediate certificates are missing that would connect the top of the certificate chain to a known public certificate authority. Second, the certificate chain may contain a certificate that is not valid at the time of the scan. This can occur either when the scan occurs before one of the certificate's 'notBefore' dates, or after one of the certificate's 'notAfter' dates. Third, the certificate chain may contain a signature that either didn't match the certificate's information, or could not be verified. Bad signatures can be fixed by getting the certificate with the bad signature to be re-signed by its issuer. Signatures that could not be verified are the result of the certificate's issuer using a signing algorithm that Nessus either does not support or does not recognize. If the remote host is a public host in production, any break in the chain nullifies the use of SSL as anyone could establish a man-in-the- middle attack against the remote host.

Solution: Purchase or generate a proper certificate for this service.
item.summary: Self-Signed SSL certificates

comments.comment:
Hallo Önder,

Bitte mit Florian anschauen, wann er zurück ist. Thx.
This addresses the production environment which is using temporary DNS (prod.distrelec.ch.distrelec.com) and temporary SSL certificates.

Open tasks for Florian

- Organization of CSR codes (HP) for multi certificates for P HP

- Order Multi SSL certificate for:
https://www.distrelec.com
https://www.distrelec.at
https://www.distrelec.it
https://www.distrelec.ch
https://www.distrelec.de

- Clarify modification from multi certificate (5 domains) to multi certificate (25 domains)

- Configure TTL for distrelec.at to 10mins

- distrelec.at / www.distrelec.at: Current redirect is configured on IP --> Should we change it to Cname? --> FBU will clarify

- Create DNS for ATOS Q
https://test.a.distrelec.com/
https://test.a.distrelec.at/
https://test.a.distrelec.ch/
https://test.a.distrelec.it/
https://test.a.distrelec.de/

Open task for René:

- Create wiki page for DNS/SSL documentation (current and new configurations)

- Take care of self signed certificates for ATOS Q

- Clarify modification from multi certificate (5 domains) to multi certificate (25 domains)
-----> Die Verfügbarkeit von unserer Seite für die Umstellung sollte kein Problem sein. Sie sollten aber für den Umstellungstermin Freitag eine konkrete Zeit und für die Switch-Backtermine am Samstag/Sonntag zumindest ein Fenster definieren, wann von unserer Seite jemand tätig werden sollte. Zum anderen müssen wir natürlich im Vorfeld noch wissen, was genau geändert werden soll.

- Configure TTL for distrelec.at to 10mins
------> DONE

- distrelec.at / www.distrelec.at: Current redirect is configured on IP --> Should we change it to Cname? --> FBU will clarify
------> Die aktuelle Einstellung ist korrekt und technisch einwandfrei. Ein CNAME ist auch möglich; ich sehe hier aber zumindest technisch keine Vorteile.

- Create DNS for ATOS Q
https://test.a.distrelec.com/
https://test.a.distrelec.at/
https://test.a.distrelec.ch/
https://test.a.distrelec.it/
https://test.a.distrelec.de/
-------> DONE

- Organization of CSR codes (HP) for multi certificates for P HP
